org.apache.spark.sql.hive.execution

类 HiveOptions

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.sql.hive.execution.HiveOptions
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HiveOptions
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    Options for the Hive data source. Note that rule DetermineHiveSerde will extract Hive serde/format information from these options.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
